c301.AdventureBook

Class EditPageActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • c301.AdventureBook.EditPageActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class EditPageActivity
extends Activity
implements Serializable
    The edit page activity allows the author to edit the contents of a page within a story.
    Author:
    Justin Hoy
